Articles.Content:
So the rocket builders page isn't dead?

Anyway, I scrapped the battleship idea. I'm too bad at orbital mechanics and calculations and stuff to make it work. Also, it was beginning to lag out my computer and just didn't look that good.

EDIT: Thought this was going into rocket builders. This new forum is screwy.

Edited December 8, 2015 by Heckspress

Rocket Builders is archived, so there's no posting there.

If you want to post craft to the Exchange please do so, but there's no roleplaying as companies any more.

3 hours ago, sal_vager said:

Rocket Builders is archived, so there's no posting there.

If you want to post craft to the Exchange please do so, but there's no roleplaying as companies any more.

Aww.
